data.text: Nkithakiheke mii thoko mii chinonthakiha aka Kuristo.
Kinowutotopelhani wo nlhatu no ukupuwelha ni wo nlhatu no uvarechesha meettuchiho yuvahilheakani alhe.
Nansho kinothanana nchuwelheke wiira Kuristo phi muru vachulhu wo kila nlhopwana ni nlhopwana phi muru vachulhu wo mahanu awe ni Nlhuku phi muru vachulhu Kuristo.
Paahi, kila nlhopwana nolhapelha ama rii namilhohi a Nlhuku uno neekhunenlhe muru awe, yoyo noveehacha muru awe.
Ni nthiyana alhapelhaka ama namilhohi a nttenga wa Nlhuku wo uhikhunelha muru, naaveehacha owannyawe, nthiyana nopanga chiicho nokhalha thoko nthiyana hammee ikharari chawe.
Nthiyana hinokhuneelha muru awe, ambaya ahameke ikharari chawe. Nansho inowulhihacha muru nthiyana ahamaka ikharari chawe ama uhamiya, paahi ambaya etu akhuneelheke muru awe.
Khinolhoka nlhopwana wiikhuneelha muru awe, ukhalhawaya yoyo phiri thoko Nlhuku ni nthimicho wa Nlhuku nansho nthiyana phi nthimicho wa nlhopwana.
Nlhopwana khaakhumilhe wa nthiyana, nansho nthiyana aakhumme wa nlhopwana.
Nlhopwana khoopiye wo nlhatu no nthiyana, nansho nthiyana oopiyee wo nlhatu no nlhopwana.
Paahi etu nthiyana akhuneelheke muru awe, ikhalheke ittu yo wooniha ikuru irii vachulhu vawe ni tho wo nlhatu no minepa o wiirimu.
Nansho ata inakhalhaka chiicho, uholho wa Athithi khaawo nthiyana wo uhikhalha nlhopwana, ni uyo nlhopwana khanokhalha wo uhikhalha nthiyana.
Ukhalhawaya thoko nthiyana chikhumelhenlhe awe wa nlhopwana ni chiichammo nlhopwana noyariya ni nthiyana, nansho kila ittu inokhuma wa Nlhuku.
Nhukumulheke mwaashinene, Chani, iholhoka nthiyana unlhapelha Nlhuku wo uhikhunelha ittu mmuruni?
Ata moopelho anene ari aya anooniha mwaari wiira wo nlhopwana ukhalha ni ikharari cho urekama inomuulhihacha muru mwanene,
nansho wo nthiyana ukhalha ni ikharari phi ittu yo nthimicho uwannyawe, vahiye ikharari cho urekama wiira chinkhuneelhe.

Yakhalhaka ntu nothanana uwiiha mwaha wo uvaanyihana vachulhu ulha mwaha ulha, paahi achuwelheke wiira hiyaano khanirina malhemalhelho makina mena attu a Nlhuku anrumelhenlhe Kuristo kharina malhemalhelho makina.
Vanouvahaakani malhehero alha, akinooria utotopelhani ata vakani. Ukumaana winyu mwaatti anrumelhenlhe Kuristo, unowiiha chittu cho ulhoka nansho unowiiha uhilhoka.
Wo uchokholha, kiheewa wiira vanokumaana inyu vamoka attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo, uhiiwanana unookhumelhelha variyari inyu. Ni mii kinorumelhelha vakani.
Ukhalhawaya anookhumelhelha malhove ovirikanacha munlhokoni mwinyu, wiira alhe arumelhelhiye we ikekhiaye achuwanie.
Eiyo we ikekhiaye nnokumaana, nansho kuhena wo nlhatu no ulhia yolhia ya Athithi!
Ukhalhawaya vanolhia inyu kila mmoka nokhalhelha yolhia awe mwanene wo uhaaweherera attu akina. Ata inokhumelhelha wiira attu akina ahalhaka ni ithalha, ni attu akina anahapalhiye!

Chani, khannooria ulhia ni uwuria mmanupani mwinyu? Ama chani, nnoveehacha nlhoko wa attu a Nlhuku ni wolhihachiha muru ayo ahirii ni ittu ayo? Kuhimeriekeni ittu yaani? Kuushipeni? Mena! Ata mena, kuhena wo ulha mwaha ulha.
Ukhalhawaya mii kahopochera ukhuma wa Athithi nlhove kovahilhe akani, wiira yolhe uhiyu ulhe Athithi Yesu vaathumihiye aya, ahokusha nkatte
nkayanshukuru Nlhuku, nkayaamia, nkayeera, “Ilha phi iruttu aka ikumihiye wo nlhatu winyu, mpangeke chiicho wo ukuupuwelha.”
Chiichammo vaamanlhe aya ulhia nkatte yahokusha ikikombe nkayeera, “Ilha phi ikikombe yo Malhehano o Naanano o iphome aka, mwiireke chiicho kila vanohalha inyu uwuria wo ukuupuwelha.”
Ukhalhawaya kila vanolhia inyu ulha nkatte ulha ni uwureria ilha ikikombe ilha, nnoonhimiacha nookhwa a Athithi, mpaka vanohalha aya uwa.
Paahi etu, kila ntu nolhia yoyo nkatte uyo ama nowuria ikikombe ya Athithi vahinothananiya, nootteka wo nlhatu no iruttu ni iphome ya Athithi.
Paahi kila ntu akhalheke ni wiikoha mwanene hinaaya ulhia nkatte ni uwuria yeyo ikikombe iyo,
ukhalhawaya ntu riyoothe nolhia ni uwuria wo uhichuwelha ikekhiaye yo iruttu ya Athithi, nolhia ni uwuria ihukumu awe mwanene.
Yoyo phi nlhatu wa attu akina munlhokoni mwinyu ukhalha ohuperia ni akina areta ni akina ukhalha o ukhwa.
Yakaari naheechuwelha we ikekhiaye, khanaahukumulhiya chiicho.
Nansho vanohukumulhiya ihu na Athithi nineettuchihiya ukhalha ni irusho wiira nihiwe naahukumulhiya vamoka ni ilhapo.
Paahi etu ashilhoko aka vanokumaana inyu ulhia yolhia ya Athithi, kila mmoka anlhiteke nkhunanawe.
Ntu wolhiye ithalha alhieke uwannyawe wiira ukumaana winyu uhiwiihe ihukumu. Nansho wo mwaha wa makina alhe kinoowa koolheherani vanohalha aka uwa.
